strings.heading: Forebrain
strings.description: Responsible for voluntary actions, thinking, and processing

strings.heading: Midbrain
strings.description: The central part of the brainstem, acting as a vital connection between the forebrain and hindbrain, and playing a crucial role in motor control, vision, and hearing

strings.heading: Pons
strings.description: Responsible for relaying signals between the cerebellum, spinal cord, and other brain regions

strings.heading: Medulla oblongata
strings.description: The lowest part of the brainstem, connecting the brain to the spinal cord and controlling vital functions like breathing
